     Pay less interest. <br />                     Save on holiday purchases<br />                     and balance transfers.                                            </h1>     </div>        <div id="faqBottom">         <div class="colLeft">              <h2>Great Introductory Rate<sup>&dagger;</sup></h2> <ul> <li>Save on interest with a <span>0%</span> introductory APR on purchases for <span>15 months</span></li> <li>Plus, you'll keep saving when you transfer higher-rate balances to Slate with a <span>0%</span> introductory APR for <span>15 months</span> on balance transfers</li> <li>A variable APR of <span>12.99%, 17.99%, or 22.99%</span> after the introductory period ends </ul>                   <h2>Introductory Balance Transfer Offer<sup>&dagger;</sup></h2> <ul> <li> Pay no balance transfer fee when you transfer a balance during the first 60 days your account is open</li> <li> After that, the fee for future transactions is 3% of the amount transferred with a minimum of $5 </li> </ul>                     <h2>Features that Protect</h2> <ul> <li><strong>Early Fraud Protection</strong> <br> Early Fraud Warning Service automatically alerts you of any suspicious activity on your account. </li>  <li><strong>Zero Liability Protection</strong><sup>*</sup><br> Zero Liability Protection means you’re not held accountable for any unauthorized purchases on your account.</li>  <li><strong>Price Protection</strong><sup>*</sup> <br> If a card purchase you made in the U.S. is advertised for less in print or online within 90 days, you can be reimbursed the difference up to $500 per item, $2,400 per year. </li>   <li><strong>Purchase Protection</strong><sup>*</sup> <br> Covers your new purchases for 120 days against damage or theft up to $500 per claim and $50,000 per account. </li>  <li><strong>Extended Warranty Protection</strong><sup>*</sup> <br> Extends the time period of the U.S. manufacturer’s warranty by an additional year, on eligible warranties of three years or less. </li>   </ul>             </div>         <div class="colRight">             <h2>No Annual Fee<sup>&dagger;</sup></h2>             <img id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_threeinrow"
